name: react-canvas-chart
description: Basically, chart is drawn by using canvas, and wrapped by react

scripts.install: npm install --save react react-dom; npm install --save-dev browserify babelify babel-preset-react babel-preset-es2015
scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --ignore node_modules --compact true --presets [ react es2015 ] ] main.js -o build/bundle.js

author: ocleo1
